bioconda.name: fastool
bioconda.summary: A simple and quick tool to read huge FastQ and FastA files (both normal and gzipped) and manipulate them.

biocontainers.name: fastool
biocontainers.summary: A simple and quick tool to read huge fastq and fasta files (both normal and gzipped) and manipulate them.

biotools.summary: Read huge FastQ and FastA files (both normal and gzipped) an demanipulate them.
